org.springframework.web.reactive.socket

Interface WebSocketHandler


  • public interface WebSocketHandler
    Handler for a WebSocket session.
    Since:
    5.0
    Author:
    Rossen Stoyanchev

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSubProtocols()
      Return the list of sub-protocols supported by this handler.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<java.lang.Void> handle(WebSocketSession session)
      Handle the WebSocket session.

    • Method Detail

      • getSubProtocols

        default java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSubProtocols()
        Return the list of sub-protocols supported by this handler.

        By default an empty list is returned.

      • handle

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<java.lang.Void> handle(WebSocketSession session)
        Handle the WebSocket session.
        Parameters:
        session - the session to handle
        Returns:
        completion Mono<Void> to indicate the outcome of the WebSocket session handling.
